advancement.destroy.aging_barrel.descrip: Use an Aging Barrel to produce a fermented drink
advancement.destroy.baby_blue_high.descr: Be under the effects of Baby Blue 1000 blocks up in the sky
advancement.destroy.beetroot_potato_cann: Shoot a mutated Beetroot from a Potato Cannon
advancement.destroy.capture_stray.descri: Capture a Stray with an empty Blaze Burner
advancement.destroy.centrifuge.descripti: Use a Centrifuge to separate two fluids
advancement.destroy.centrifuge_lubricate: Fully lubricate a Centrifuge so it is maximally efficient
advancement.destroy.distillation.descrip: Separate a fluid into parts by Distillation
advancement.destroy.dynamo_charging.desc: Charge an Item with a Dynamo
Start electrolyzing a fluid with a Dynamo
advancement.destroy.extrude.description: Push a block through an Extrusion Die
advancement.destroy.fix_pollution.descri: Bring the world from fully polluted to pollution-free
advancement.destroy.hyperaccumulate.desc: Use Hyperaccumulating Fertilizer to mutate a crop
advancement.destroy.mechanical_hands.des: Hear the flibbity jibbity jibber jabber
advancement.destroy.meth.description: Attempt to make friends with the FBI
advancement.destroy.ostwald_process.desc: Create Nitric Acid with a Rhodium catalyst in a Vat
advancement.destroy.pollution.descriptio: Pollute the world as much as possible
advancement.destroy.pumpjack.description: Use a Pumpjack to extract Crude Oil
advancement.destroy.sand_castle.descript: Destroy a Baby Villager's sand castle, making it cry
advancement.destroy.seismometer.descript: Discover Crude Void Oil with a Seismometer
advancement.destroy.tear_bottle.descript: Collect the tears of a crying Mob to use for Salt
advancement.destroy.urinate.description: Urinate by crouching over a Cauldron while inebriated
badge.destroy.patreon_1.description: Pledge to the first tier on the Destroy Patreon
badge.destroy.patreon_2.description: Go the full 7.77 yards and pledge to the second tier on the Destroy Patreon
badge.destroy.patreon_3.description: Show ultimate support by pledging to the highest tier on the Destroy Patreon
badge.petrolpark.beta_tester.description: Help test upcoming features of Destroy
badge.petrolpark.content_creator.descrip: Give Destroy free promotion by featuring it as a content creator
badge.petrolpark.developer.description: Create code or art for Destroy
badge.petrolpark.early_bird.description: Be among the first 1000 Players to play a major update to Destroy
badge.petrolpark.nitro.description: Boost the Discord server with Nitro
badge.petrolpark.suggestion.description: Contribute a new idea for Destroy that ends up getting implemented
badge.petrolpark.translator.description: Make an significant contribution to the localizations of Destroy
block.destroy.agar_block.tooltip.summary: A _nutrient-rich_ substance, perfect for harboring all sorts of _moulds_, _bacteria_ and _fungi_.
block.destroy.anfo_block.tooltip.behavio: Does _minimal damage_ to Mobs and _only_ explodes stones and dirt blocks, leaving ores and contraptions _untouched_.
block.destroy.cordite.tooltip.summary: An explosive that _vaporizes_ anything in its way, making it optimal for mining for _Ancient Debris_.
block.destroy.cordite.tooltip.behaviour1: _Evaporates_ liquids, doesn't drop items and does _minimal damage_ to mobs.
block.destroy.dynamite_block.tooltip.sum: This explosive is _perfect_ for cleanly _excavating_ areas. The _size_ and _shape_ of the area can be configured.
block.destroy.dynamite_block.tooltip.beh: Clears out a _perfect cuboid_ (except for _indestructible_ blocks) and doesn't drop items.
block.destroy.nitrocellulose_block.toolt: Some blocks have a chance of _special drops_ due to the intense _heat and pressure_.
block.destroy.pollutometer.tooltip.summa: A super high-tech device which can _quantifiably measure_ levels of _pollution_ in the world.
block.destroy.pollutometer.tooltip.condi: When Used as Display Link Source
block.destroy.pollutometer.tooltip.behav: Displays the level of the selected type of pollution
commands.destroy.babyblueaddiction.set.m: Set Baby Blue Addiction level of %s on %s players
commands.destroy.babyblueaddiction.set.s: Set Baby Blue Addiction level of %s on %s
commands.destroy.babyblueaddiction.query: %s has a Baby Blue Addiction level of %s
commands.destroy.crudeoil: Generated %s mB of Crude Oil in the chunk at [%s, %s, %s]
commands.destroy.pollution.query: Pollution of type %s has a level of %s
commands.destroy.pollution.set: Set level of Pollution of type %s to %s. A reload may be required for some changes to take effect.
destroy.chemistry.acid: Acids are species which can donate hydrogen ions ({protons, destroy:proton}) to other species. They react with {bases, destroy:base}.
destroy.chemistry.addition: An addition reaction is one in which a group is added to a {molecule, destroy:molecule}.
destroy.chemistry.addition_elimination: An addition-elimination reaction is one in which one group is removed from a {molecule, destroy:molecule}, and only then another is added - this is unlike a {substitution, destroy:substitution}, where both happen at once.
destroy.chemistry.addition_polymer: Addition {polymers, destroy:polymer} do not {condensate, destroy:condensation_polymer} a byproduct, and often proceed by {free-radical, destroy:radical} {mechanism, destroy:mechanism}.
destroy.chemistry.aldehyde: An aldehyde is a type of [destroy:carbonyl] where the carbonyl carbon is {bonded, destroy:bond} to at least one hydrogen, unlike a {ketone, destroy:ketone}.
destroy.chemistry.alkane: Alkanes are a group of {molecules, destroy:molecule} containing only carbon and hydrogen, and only single {bonds, destroy:bond}.
destroy.chemistry.aqua_regia: Latin for 'royal water', aqua regia is a mixture of [destroy:nitric_acid] and [destroy:hydrochloric_acid] which can {dissolve, destroy:solution} {noble, destroy:inert} metals like gold.
destroy.chemistry.atom: Atoms are tiny particles consisting of {positive, destroy:charge} {nuclei, destroy:nucleus} surrounded by {negative, destroy:charge} {electrons, destroy:electron}.
destroy.chemistry.base: Bases are species which can accept hydrogen ions ({protons, destroy:proton}) from other species. They react with {acids, destroy:acid}.
destroy.chemistry.bond: Two {atoms, destroy:atom} can bond by sharing a pair of {electrons, destroy:electron}. The {positive, destroy:charge} {nuclei, destroy:nucleus} of the atoms are attracted to the {negative, destroy:charge} {electrons, destroy:electron}, requiring lots of energy to be pulled apart.
destroy.chemistry.carbonylation: A carbonylation is a reaction with [destroy:carbon_monoxide].
destroy.chemistry.carboxylation: A carboxylation is a reaction with [destroy:carbon_dioxide]. It is the opposite of a {decarboxylation, destroy:decarboxylation}.
destroy.chemistry.charge: Charge is an innate property like mass. Things can be positively or negatively charged, and oppositely-charged things will attract each other whereas same-charged things will repel.
destroy.chemistry.catalyst: A catalyst is a substance that speeds up or enables a chemical reaction, without being used up itself.
destroy.chemistry.condensation_polymer: Condensation {polymers, destroy:polymer} such as DNA and nylon 'condensate' a small {molecule, destroy:molecule} such as [destroy:water].
destroy.chemistry.cycle: A cyclic {molecule, destroy:molecule} has a least one loop in its structure.
destroy.chemistry.decarboxylation: A decarboxylation is a reaction in which [destroy:carbon_dioxide] is {eliminated, destroy:elimination} from a {molecule, destroy:molecule}. It is the opposite of {carboxylation, destroy:carboxylation}.
destroy.chemistry.degree: Degree refers to the number of carbon {atoms, destroy:atom} to which an atom is {bonded, destroy:bond}. For example, a carbon atom bonded to two others is "secondary" (has a degree of two).
destroy.chemistry.diene: A {molecule, destroy:molecule} which is a diene contains at least two {double bonds, destroy:double_bond} separated by a {single bond, destroy:bond}.
destroy.chemistry.dienophile: Dienophiles are {molecules, destroy:molecule} attracted to {dienes, destroy:diene}. Some [destroy:alkene]s and alkynes are dieneophiles.
destroy.chemistry.disproportionation: Disproportionation is when the same species is both {oxidized, destroy:oxidation} and {reduced, destroy:reduction} in a reaction.
destroy.chemistry.double_bond: If two {atoms, destroy:atom} are double-{bonded, destroy:bond}, they share two pairs of {electrons, destroy:electron} between them rather than one.
destroy.chemistry.electron: Electrons are low-mass, {negatively, destroy:charge} charged {subatomic, destroy:subatomic} particles.
destroy.chemistry.electrophile: An electrophile is a species which can accept an {electron, destroy:electron} pair. They are the opposite of {nucleophiles, destroy:nucleophile}.
destroy.chemistry.elimination: An elimination reaction is one in which a group is removed from a {molecule, destroy:molecule}.
destroy.chemistry.endothermic: Endothermic reactions take in heat. They are the opposite of {endothermic, destroy:endothermic} reactions.
destroy.chemistry.exothermic: Exothermic reactions produce heat. They are the opposite of {exothermic, destroy:exothermic} reactions.
destroy.chemistry.halide: The halides are the {ions, destroy:ion} of the {halogens, destroy:halogen}.
destroy.chemistry.halogen: The halogens are the group of elements including Fluorine, [destroy:chlorine], Bromine and [destroy:iodine].
destroy.chemistry.hydrolysis: A hydrolysis is a reaction with [destroy:water].
destroy.chemistry.hydrogenation: A hydrogenation reaction is a type of {reduction, destroy:reduction} with [destroy:hydrogen].
destroy.chemistry.hygroscopic: Hygroscopic substances have a great affinity for taking in [destroy:water].
destroy.chemistry.ion: Ions are {charged, destroy:charge} {atoms, destroy:atom} or {molecules, destroy:molecule}.
destroy.chemistry.ketone: A ketone is a type of [destroy:carbonyl] where the carbonyl carbon is {bonded, destroy:bond} to two other carbons (and no hydrogens), unlike an {aldehyde, destroy:aldehyde}.
destroy.chemistry.mechanism: A mechanism describes how a reaction happens - where {electrons, destroy:electron} move; what intermediate species there are.
destroy.chemistry.mixed_xylenes: 'Mixed xylenes' is the name for the mixture of [destroy:metaxylene], [destroy:orthoxylene], [destroy:paraxylene] and [destroy:ethylbenzene].
destroy.chemistry.nucleophile: A nucleophile is a species which can donate an {electron, destroy:electron} pair. They are attracted to {positive, destroy:charge} areas ({nuclei, destroy:nucleus} are positive, hence the name). They are the opposite of {electrophiles, destroy:electrophile}.
destroy.chemistry.neutron: A neutron is a neutral (not {charged, destroy:charge}) particle found in the {nucleus, destroy:nucleus} of an {atom, destroy:atom}.
destroy.chemistry.nucleus: At the center of each {atom, destroy:atom} is a nucleus, consisting of {protons, destroy:proton} and {neutrons, destroy:neutron}.
destroy.chemistry.oxidation: An {atom, destroy:atom} is oxidized when it loses {electron(s), destroy:electron}, often by reaction with [destroy:oxygen]. Oxidation is the opposite of {reduction, destroy:reduction}.
destroy.chemistry.proton: A proton is a {positive, destroy:charge} {subatomic, destroy:subatomic} particle found in the {nucleus, destroy:nucleus}. The number of protons in an {atom, destroy:atom} determines what element it is.
destroy.chemistry.polarity: A polar {molecule, destroy:molecule} has a {positive, destroy:charge} end and a {negative, destroy:charge} end.
destroy.chemistry.polymer: 'Poly' is Greek for 'many', as polymers are {molecules, destroy:molecule} containing many repeating 'monomers'. Plastics are all polymers, and types include {addition-, destroy:addition_polymer} and {condensation-, destroy:condensation_polymer} polymers.
destroy.chemistry.precipitation: Precipitation is when a dissolved species comes out of {solution, destroy:solution}.
destroy.chemistry.radical: While most species contain {electrons, destroy:electron} in pairs, radicals are species with unpaired electrons, and are often very reactive.
destroy.chemistry.radical_initiator: Radical initiators are species which produce {radicals, destroy:radical}, and can kick-start a {polymerisation, destroy:polymer} reaction.
destroy.chemistry.reduction: An {atom, destroy:atom} is reduced when it gains {electron(s), destroy:electron}. Reduction is the opposite of {oxidation, destroy:oxidation}.
destroy.chemistry.sequestration: Sequestration is the capture of a gas, to allow it to be stored as a solid or liquid.
destroy.chemistry.solution: A solution contains a solute dissolved in a solvent.
destroy.chemistry.substitution: A substitution reaction is one in which one group on a {molecule, destroy:molecule} is quickly replaced by another.
destroy.chemistry.syngas: Synthesis gas, or 'syngas' is a mixture of [destroy:carbon_dioxide] and [destroy:hydrogen].
destroy.chemistry.thermal_decomposition: Thermal decomposition, or pyrolysis, is the spontaneous breakdown of a species when heated.
destroy.chemistry.transalkylation: Transalkylation is the transfer of {alkyl groups, destroy:alkane} between [destroy:benzene] rings.
destroy.chemistry.ultraviolet_catalysed_: This reaction is {catalyzed, destroy:catalyst} by UV light, from the sun, Blacklights or similar blocks. Ponder the Vat Controller to learn more.
destroy.chemistry.unknown_definition: Unknown definition - report this as a bug.
destroy.ponder.tag.chemistry.description: Components which can be used to manipulate Mixtures
destroy.ponder.tag.destroy.description: Components and Curiosities added by Destroy
destroy.ponder.tag.vat_side_blocks.descr: Blocks from which Vats can be constructed
destroy.ponder.aging_barrel.header: Fermenting beverages with the Aging Barrel
destroy.ponder.aging_barrel.text_1: Aging Barrels, like Basins, can be filled with fluids and items.
destroy.ponder.aging_barrel.text_2: Over a long time, the Aging Barrel will create a new fluid.
destroy.ponder.aging_barrel.text_3: The Aging Barrel is also the workplace of the Innkeeper, who sells Yeast at the Apprentice level.
destroy.ponder.bubble_cap_generic.text_1: Vertically stacked Bubble Caps create a Distillation Tower.
destroy.ponder.bubble_cap_generic.text_2: Distillation Towers will automatically distill fluids in the bottom-most Cap (the Reboiler).
destroy.ponder.bubble_cap_generic.text_3: The higher the boiling point of the fluid, the further up the Tower it will travel.
destroy.ponder.bubble_cap_generic.text_4: Some Distillation recipes require a heater underneath the Reboiler.
destroy.ponder.bubble_cap_mixtures.text_: Distillation towers will distill any Mixtures.
You can see the temperature of the Reboiler with Goggles.
It can be increased with a Blaze Burner.
Species with a boiling point higher than this will remained mixed in the Reboiler.
Gases with a boiling point lower than room temperature will remain mixed in the top Cap.
All other species will form fractions according to their boiling point.
The more Bubble Caps, the more fractions.
All this allows you to separate species whose boiling points aren't too low or high.
Use a Display Link to more easily see the contents of a fraction.
destroy.ponder.centrifuge_generic.text_1: The Centrifuge will slowly separate any fluid pumped into the top.
destroy.ponder.centrifuge_generic.text_2: The denser resultant fluid can be extracted from the side.
destroy.ponder.centrifuge_generic.text_3: The lighter resultant fluid can be extracted from the bottom.
destroy.ponder.centrifuge_generic.text_4: The Centrifuge does not actively pump out fluids - a Mechanical Pump must be used.
destroy.ponder.centrifuge_generic.text_5: Lubrication can be applied to increase the processing speed.
destroy.ponder.centrifuge_mixture.text_1: Centrifuges can also be used to separate Mixtures into their component species, based on their densities.
destroy.ponder.centrifuge_mixture.text_2: They will always produce two products of equal volume.
destroy.ponder.centrifuge_mixture.text_3: Species are separated based on their liquid densities.
destroy.ponder.coaxial_gear_shaftless.he: Using Coaxial Cogwheels as shaftless Cogwheels
destroy.ponder.coaxial_gear_shaftless.te: Coaxial Cogwheels connect similarly to regular Cogwheels.
However, they have no Shaft, allowing for configurations that would be impossible with regular Cogwheels.
destroy.ponder.coaxial_gear_through.head: Rotating Shafts through Coaxial Cogwheels
destroy.ponder.coaxial_gear_through.text: Use a Coaxial Cogwheel on a Shaft to surround it.
You can also use a Shaft on a Coaxial Cogwheel.
In either case, there must be at least two Shaft blocks.
The Shaft rotates completely independently of the Coaxial Cogwheel.
They can even rotate at different speeds and in different directions.
destroy.ponder.cooler.text_1: Right-click a Stray with an Empty Blaze Burner to capture it.
destroy.ponder.cooler.text_2: Your new friend can be used to cool Basins.
destroy.ponder.cooler.text_3: Unlike the Blaze Burner, the Refrigerstraytor can only run off of Mixtures, piped in the bottom.
destroy.ponder.cooler.text_4: This Mixture must contain species with the 'Refrigerant' tag.
destroy.ponder.cooler.text_6: Higher-concentration refrigerants will keep the Refrigerstraytor cold for longer.
destroy.ponder.cooler.text_7: Once cold, it is required for some recipes.
destroy.ponder.differential.text_1: Differentials rotate at the average speed of the two input Shafts.
destroy.ponder.differential.text_2: When connected to a small Cog, this is effectively summing the two speeds.
destroy.ponder.differential.text_6: Shafts spinning in the opposite direction are treated like negative numbers.
destroy.ponder.differential.text_10: While connected to two Shafts, the Differential only transfers the stress to the large Cogwheel through one.
destroy.ponder.differential.text_13: If the outer gear is powered, the Differential will break.
destroy.ponder.double_cardan_shaft.heade: Relaying rotational force with Double Cardan Shafts
destroy.ponder.double_cardan_shaft.text_: Using two mechanisms called 'universal joints', Double Cardan Shafts can relay rotatation around a corner.
Use a Wrench to rotate them around the axis you clicked.
destroy.ponder.dynamo_redstone.header: Creating Redstone signals with the Dynamo
destroy.ponder.dynamo_redstone.text_1: A Dynamo will confer a Redstone signal to the block directly beneath.
destroy.ponder.dynamo_redstone.text_2: The strength of the signal is proportional to the rotational speed of the Dynamo.
destroy.ponder.dynamo_charging.text_1: The Dynamo can process items provided beneath it.
destroy.ponder.dynamo_charging.text_2: Items can be dropped or placed on a Depot underneath the Dynamo.
destroy.ponder.dynamo_electrolysis.text_: A Dynamo placed two blocks above a Basin can be used to carry out electrolysis recipes.
destroy.ponder.extrusion_die.header: Extruding blocks with the Extrusion Die
destroy.ponder.extrusion_die.text_1: The Extrusion Die can transform some blocks when they are pushed through it.
destroy.ponder.extrusion_die.text_2: The Extrusion Die must remain static.
destroy.ponder.reactions.text_1: Vats, and Basins with Mixers can be used to react Mixtures of chemicals.
destroy.ponder.reactions.text_2: Destroy simulates this on the Molecular level - reactions happen according to the real laws of chemistry.
destroy.ponder.reactions.text_3: For example, reactions can be sped up by increasing the temperature and concentration of reactants.
destroy.ponder.reactions.text_4: Use JEI to see the array of reactions possible. Hover over highlighted terms to see their definitions.
destroy.ponder.phytomining.text_1: Hyperaccumulating Fertilizer can be used like Bone Meal to mutate certain crops.
destroy.ponder.phytomining.text_2: Some mutations result in the uptake of ores placed a block below the farmland.
destroy.ponder.planetary_gearset.header: Out-of-this-world gearing with the Planetary Gearset
destroy.ponder.planetary_gearset.text_1: Planetary Gearsets connect almost identically to Large Cogwheels (press Q to learn more about these).
destroy.ponder.planetary_gearset.text_2: However, the Shaft of a Planetary Gearset rotates twice as fast, and in the opposite direction to the teeth.
destroy.ponder.pumpjack.header: Extracting Crude Oil with the Pumpjack
destroy.ponder.pumpjack.text_1: Locate Crude Oil with a Handheld Seismometer.
destroy.ponder.pumpjack.text_2: When powered anywhere in a chunk containing an oil reserve, the Pumpjack will slowly extract Crude Oil.
destroy.ponder.pumpjack.text_3: The Pumpjack does not actively pump out the Oil - a Mechanical Pump must still be used.
destroy.ponder.vat_construction.text_1: To make a Vat, first create an enclosed shell.
destroy.ponder.vat_construction.text_2: The only space should be for the Controller.
destroy.ponder.vat_construction.text_3: Vats can only be made out of certain blocks.
destroy.ponder.vat_construction.text_4: You can view all these blocks in the 'Vat Materials' section on the left.
destroy.ponder.vat_construction.text_5: These blocks can be combined in any way. What blocks you choose will affect the Vat's behaviour.
destroy.ponder.vat_construction.text_6: Vats can have many sizes, ranging from a single block of interior space...
destroy.ponder.vat_construction.text_8: They don't have to be cubic.
destroy.ponder.vat_construction.text_9: Like the blocks of which it's made, the shape and size of a Vat also affects its behaviour - for example, its capacity.
destroy.ponder.vat_construction.text_10: The edges of a Vat are not needed, and do not form part of the Vat.
destroy.ponder.vat_interaction.text_1: Use a Wrench on the outer side of a Vat to see its internal temperature.
destroy.ponder.vat_interaction.text_2: This does not work on the edges or corners.
destroy.ponder.vat_interaction.text_3: Wrench it again to see the pressure.
destroy.ponder.vat_interaction.text_4: Chemicals can be pulled and pushed from Vats with Fluid Pipes and Pumps.
destroy.ponder.vat_interaction.text_5: Pay close attention to the tooltip when hovering over a Pipe. If it is above the liquid level, it will only extract gas.
destroy.ponder.vat_interaction.text_6: Items can be pulled in and out through any side of the Vat.
destroy.ponder.vat_interaction.text_7: Wrench the top of a Vat to turn it into a vent. This will let out any gas and replace it with air.
destroy.ponder.vat_interaction.text_8: The vent can be opened and closed with redstone.
destroy.ponder.vat_interaction.text_9: Vats can be heated with Blaze Burners and cooled with Refrigerstrayters. This affects the rate of reactions.
destroy.ponder.uv.text_1: Some Reactions require ultraviolet light as a catalyst.
destroy.ponder.uv.text_2: Vats receive UV through transparent blocks in the top, regardless of the time of day.
destroy.ponder.uv.text_3: More UV power is supplied by Blacklights placed directly adjacent to transparent sides of the Vat.
destroy.generic_reaction.acyl_chloride_e: The joining of an [destroy:acyl_chloride] and an [destroy:alcohol] to make an [destroy:ester].
destroy.generic_reaction.acyl_chloride_f: The formation of an [destroy:acyl_chloride] from a [destroy:carboxylic_acid].
destroy.generic_reaction.acyl_chloride_h: The rapid reaction of an [destroy:acyl_chloride] with [destroy:water].
destroy.generic_reaction.alcohol_oxidati: The {oxidation, destroy:oxidation} of a non-{tertiary, destroy:degree} [destroy:alcohol] to a [destroy:carbonyl]. Carry out at low temperature to prevent further {oxidation, destroy:oxidation}.
destroy.generic_reaction.aldehyde_oxidat: The {oxidation, destroy:oxidation} of an {aldehyde, destroy:aldehyde} to a [destroy:carboxylic_acid].
destroy.generic_reaction.alkene_hydrolys: The {hydrolysis, destroy:hydrolysis} of an [destroy:alkene] to form an [destroy:alcohol]. The alcohol group gets added to the higher {degree, destroy:degree} carbon.
destroy.generic_reaction.alkene_hydrogen: The nickel-{catalyzed, destroy:catalyst} {hydrogenation, destroy:hydrogenation} of an [destroy:alkene].
destroy.generic_reaction.amide_hydrolysi: The {hydrolysis, destroy:hydrolysis} of an [destroy:amide] to produce a [destroy:carboxylic_acid].
destroy.generic_reaction.carbonyl_reduct: The {reduction, destroy:reduction} of a [destroy:carbonyl] to a [destroy:alcohol].
destroy.generic_reaction.carboxylic_acid: The [destroy:sulfuric_acid]-{catalyzed, destroy:catalyst} joining of an [destroy:alcohol] and [destroy:carboxylic_acid] to make an [destroy:ester], in {anhydrous, destroy:anhydrous} conditions.
The {reduction, destroy:reduction} of a [destroy:carboxylic_acid] to an {aldehyde, destroy:aldehyde}. Carry out at low temperature to prevent further {reduction, destroy:reduction}.
destroy.generic_reaction.cyanide_nucleop: The {nucleophilic, destroy:nucleophile} {addition, destroy:addition} of [destroy:cyanide] to a [destroy:carbonyl].
destroy.generic_reaction.halide_amine_su: The {nucleophilic, destroy:nucleophile} {substitution, destroy:substitution} of a hydrogen from an [destroy:non_tertiary_amine] for an organo{halide, destroy:halide} (any {halide, destroy:halide}, not just a [destroy:chloride]).
destroy.generic_reaction.halide_ammonia_: The {nucleophilic, destroy:nucleophile} {substitution, destroy:substitution} of any organo{halide, destroy:halide} (not just a [destroy:chloride]) for an [destroy:amine] group.
destroy.generic_reaction.halide_cyanide_: The {nucleophilic, destroy:nucleophile} {substitution, destroy:substitution} of any organo{halide, destroy:halide} (not just a [destroy:chloride]) for an [destroy:nitrile] group.
destroy.generic_reaction.halide_hydroxid: The {nucleophilic, destroy:nucleophile} {substitution, destroy:substitution} of any organo{halide, destroy:halide} (not just a [destroy:chloride]) for an [destroy:alcohol] group.
destroy.generic_reaction.nitrile_hydroge: The nickel-{catalyzed, destroy:catalyst} {hydrogenation, destroy:hydrogenation} of a [destroy:nitrile] to produce an [destroy:amine].
destroy.generic_reaction.nitrile_hydroly: The {hydrolysis, destroy:hydrolysis} of a [destroy:nitrile] to produce an [destroy:amide].
destroy.reaction.abs_copolymerization.de: The {free-radical, destroy:radical} {addition copolymerization, destroy:addition_polymer} of [destroy:acrylonitrile], [destroy:butadiene] and [destroy:styrene].
destroy.reaction.aibn_synthesis.descript: A two-step synthesis in reality, which produces the {radical initiator, destroy:radical_initiator} [destroy:aibn].
destroy.reaction.andrussow_process.descr: A high-temperature platinum-{catalyzed, destroy:catalyst} method for the production of [destroy:hydrogen_cyanide].
destroy.reaction.anthraquinone_process.d: The second step in the production of [destroy:hydrogen_peroxide] by the {reduction, destroy:reduction} of [destroy:oxygen] by [destroy:ethylanthrahydroquinone].
destroy.reaction.anthraquinone_reduction: The first step in the production of [destroy:hydrogen_peroxide] - {hydrogenating, destroy:hydrogenation} [destroy:ethylanthraquinone].
destroy.reaction.baby_blue_precipitation: The addition of {ions, destroy:ion} to the solution increases its {polarity, destroy:polarity}, causing the [destroy:methyl_salicylate] to {precipitate, destroy:precipitation}.
destroy.reaction.basic_diels_alder_react: A Diels-Alder reaction is a type of {cyclization, destroy:cycle} that occurs between a {diene, destroy:diene} and a {dienophile, destroy:dienophile}.
destroy.reaction.benzene_ethylation.desc: An {acid, destroy:acid}-{catalyzed, destroy:catalyst} method to produce [destroy:ethylbenzene].
destroy.reaction.carbon_capture.descript: A method of {sequestering, destroy:sequestration} [destroy:carbon_dioxide] by reaction with calcium oxide.
destroy.reaction.carbon_tetrachloride_fl: The {substitution, destroy:substitution} of chlorine for fluorine in [destroy:carbon_tetrachloride] to produce various fluorinated products.
destroy.reaction.cellulose_nitration.des: A method for the production of Nitrocellulose by reacting cellulose with [destroy:nitric_acid] and [destroy:sulfuric_acid].
destroy.reaction.chlorine_haloform_react: Repeated chlorination of the slightly {acidic, destroy:acid} {ketone, destroy:ketone} group, followed by a {nucleophilic, destroy:nucleophile} {substitution, destroy:substitution} to form a carboxylate.
destroy.reaction.chlorine_solvation.desc: The reversible dissolution of [destroy:chlorine] in [destroy:water] under UV light.
destroy.reaction.chloroform_fluorination: A method for the production of [destroy:chlorodifluoromethane], a refrigerant and PTFE precursor.
destroy.reaction.cisplatin_synthesis.des: A method for the production of the chemotherapeutic medicine [destroy:cisplatin].
destroy.reaction.cordite_precipitation.d: The formation of the explosive Cordite.
destroy.reaction.contact_process.descrip: The {oxidation, destroy:oxidation} of [destroy:sulfur_dioxide], ultimately used to make [destroy:sulfuric_acid].
destroy.reaction.copper_dissolution.desc: The {dissolution, destroy:solution} of copper in {acid, destroy:acid}.
The {dissolution, destroy:solution} of copper ore in {acid, destroy:acid} allowing for ore tripling.
destroy.reaction.cumene_process.descript: A method of producing [destroy:phenol] and [destroy:acetone] by the {oxidation, destroy:oxidation} of [destroy:benzene] and [destroy:propene], via a {free radical, destroy:radical} {mechanism, destroy:mechanism}.
destroy.reaction.cyclohexene_oxidative_c: A reaction about which little is known, as no chemist has ever been able to actually observe cleavage up close.
destroy.reaction.ethylanthraquinone_synt: A method for the production of [destroy:ethylanthraquinone].
destroy.reaction.ethylbenzene_dehydrogen: The de{hydrogenation, destroy:hydrogenation} of [destroy:ethylbenzene] by superheated steam to produce [destroy:styrene].
destroy.reaction.ethylbenzene_transalkyl: The {transalkylation, destroy:transalkylation} of [destroy:ethylbenzene] to produce {mixed xylenes, destroy:mixed_xylenes}.
destroy.reaction.fluorite_dissolution.de: The {dissolution, destroy:solution} of Fluorite in {acid, destroy:acid}.
destroy.reaction.gold_dissolution.descri: The {dissolving, destroy:solution} of gold in {aqua regia, destroy:aqua_regia}. Funnily enough, you will need 24 carrots to produce 24-karat gold.
destroy.reaction.glycerol_nitration.desc: A method for the production of [destroy:nitroglycerine] (dynamite) by reacting [destroy:glycerol] with [destroy:nitric_acid] and [destroy:sulfuric_acid].
destroy.reaction.haber_process.descripti: Also known as the 'Haber' process, but Fritz Haber was a radical German nationalist obsessed with chemical weapons.
destroy.reaction.hydrogen_chloride_synth: A synthesis of [destroy:hydrochloric_acid] from its constituent elements.
destroy.reaction.hydrogen_iodide_synthes: A method for the production of [destroy:hydrogen_iodide].
destroy.reaction.hydroxide_neutralizatio: The reaction of an {acid, destroy:acid} and a {base, destroy:base} to produce [destroy:water].
The {disproportionation, destroy:disproportionation} of [destroy:chlorine] with sodium hydroxide.
destroy.reaction.iodide_displacement.des: The {oxidation, destroy:oxidation} of [destroy:iodide] and {reduction, destroy:reduction} of [destroy:chlorine].
destroy.reaction.iron_dissolution.descri: The {dissolution, destroy:solution} of iron in {acid, destroy:acid}.
destroy.reaction.iron_ore_dissolution.de: The {dissolution, destroy:solution} of iron ore in {acid, destroy:acid} allowing for ore tripling.
destroy.reaction.kelp_dissolution.descri: The extract of [destroy:iodine] from kelp by {dissolving, destroy:solution} it in [destroy:ethanol].
destroy.reaction.mercury_fulmination.des: An antique method for the production of the primary explosive, fulminated mercury.
destroy.reaction.metaxylene_transalkylat: The {transalkylation, destroy:transalkylation} of [destroy:metaxylene] to produce {mixed xylenes, destroy:mixed_xylenes}.
destroy.reaction.methanol_synthesis.desc: A method for the production of [destroy:methanol] from {syngas, destroy:syngas}. React {anaerobically, destroy:anaerobic} to prevent the formation of [destroy:carbon_dioxide].
destroy.reaction.methyl_acetate_carbonyl: A method for the production of [destroy:acetic_anhydride] by the {carbonylation, destroy:carbonylation} of [destroy:methyl_acetate].
destroy.reaction.nhn_synthesis.descripti: A method for the production of nickel hydrazine nitrate.
destroy.reaction.nickel_dissolution.desc: The {dissolution, destroy:solution} of nickel in {acid, destroy:acid}.
The {dissolution, destroy:solution} of nickel ore in {acid, destroy:acid} allowing for ore tripling.
destroy.reaction.nitronium_formation.des: The [destroy:nitronium] ion is formed in 'nitrating acid' - it is an {electrophile, destroy:electrophile} which reacts to form many explosives.
destroy.reaction.oleum_formation.descrip: The reversible formation of [destroy:oleum] in highly concentrated solutions of [destroy:sulfuric_acid].
destroy.reaction.oleum_hydration.descrip: The rapid {hydration, destroy:hydrolysis} of [destroy:oleum] which is responsible for [destroy:sulfuric_acid]'s {hygroscopy, destroy:hygroscopic}.
destroy.reaction.orthoxylene_oxidation.d: The [destroy:mercury]-{catalyzed, destroy:catalyst} {oxidation, destroy:oxidation} of [destroy:orthoxylene] to [destroy:phthalic_anhydride] in air.
destroy.reaction.orthoxylene_transalkyla: The {transalkylation, destroy:transalkylation} of [destroy:orthoxylene] to produce {mixed xylenes, destroy:mixed_xylenes}.
destroy.reaction.ostwald_process.descrip: A rhodium-{catalyzed, destroy:catalyst} method for the production of [destroy:nitric_acid]. The Ostwald Process is closely linked to the Haber Process.
destroy.reaction.paraxylene_transalkylat: The {transalkylation, destroy:transalkylation} of [destroy:paraxylene] to produce {mixed xylenes, destroy:mixed_xylenes}.
destroy.reaction.peroxide_process.descri: The {ketone, destroy:ketone}-{catalyzed, destroy:catalyst} {oxidation, destroy:oxidation} of [destroy:ammonia] to [destroy:hydrazine].
destroy.reaction.phenol_nitration.descri: A method for the production of [destroy:picric_acid] by reacting [destroy:phenol] with [destroy:nitric_acid] and [destroy:sulfuric_acid].
destroy.reaction.tatp.description: A dangerous way of producing an explosive, which has injured many an amatuer chemist.
destroy.reaction.toluene_nitration.descr: A method for the production of [destroy:trinitrotoluene] by reacting [destroy:toluene] with [destroy:nitric_acid] and [destroy:sulfuric_acid].
destroy.reaction.toluene_transalkylation: The {transalkylation, destroy:transalkylation} of [destroy:toluene] to produce {mixed xylenes, destroy:mixed_xylenes} and [destroy:benzene].
The synthesis of the contact explosive 'Touch Powder' by soaking [destroy:iodine] in [destroy:ammonia].
destroy.reaction.steam_reformation.descr: A method for the production of {syngas, destroy:syngas}.
destroy.reaction.styrene_butadiene_copol: The {free-radical, destroy:radical} {addition copolymerization, destroy:addition_polymer} of [destroy:styrene] and [destroy:butadiene].
destroy.reaction.sodium_dissolution.desc: The violent, {exothermic, destroy:exothermic} reaction of [destroy:sodium] and [destroy:water] that earns the {alkali, destroy:base} metals their name.
destroy.reaction.sulfur_trioxide_hydrati: The {hydration, destroy:hydrolysis} of [destroy:sulfur_trioxide] to make [destroy:sulfuric_acid], which is the ultimate product from combining [destroy:sulfur], [destroy:oxygen] and [destroy:water].
destroy.reaction.vinyl_acetate_synthesis: A palladium-{catalyzed, destroy:catalyst} method for the production of [destroy:vinyl_acetate].
destroy.reaction.zinc_dissolution.descri: The {dissolution, destroy:solution} of zinc in {acid, destroy:acid}.
destroy.reaction.zinc_ore_dissolution.de: The {dissolution, destroy:solution} of zinc ore in {acid, destroy:acid} allowing for ore tripling.
destroy.tooltip.basin.too_full.title: Overfilled:
destroy.tooltip.basin.too_full: This Basin will _overflow_ if it reacts. Try a _Vat_ instead.
destroy.tooltip.coaxial_gear.shaft_too_s: Shafts must be at least two blocks in length to go through a Coaxial Cogwheel
destroy.tooltip.contamination: This item is contaminated with _%1$s_. If taken off, this may be harmful. _Decontaminate_ by washing with an Encased Fan.
destroy.tooltip.eating_prevented.baby_bl: You don't feel hungry right now
destroy.tooltip.eating_prevented.gas_mas: Your protective facewear blocks your mouth
destroy.tooltip.liable_to_change: This feature is likely to be _removed_ or _heavily modified_ in the full release of Destroy. (You can disable this message in configs).
destroy.tooltip.mixture_ingredient.molec: Must contain _%1$s_ at a concentration between _%2$sM_ and _%3$sM_. All other molecules must be _solvents_ or _low in concentration_.
destroy.tooltip.mixture_ingredient.anion: Must contain _%1$s_ at a concentration between _%2$sM_ and _%3$sM_. All other molecules must be _cations_, _solvents_ or _low in concentration_.
destroy.tooltip.mixture_ingredient.catio: Must contain _%1$s_ at a concentration between _%2$sM_ and _%3$sM_. All other molecules must be _anions_, _solvents_ or _low in concentration_.
destroy.tooltip.mixture_ingredient.molec: Must contain molecules with the following tag:
The _combined concentration_ of these Molecules must be between _%1$sM_ and _%2$sM_. All other molecules must be _solvents_ or _low in concentration_. Remember you can _search_ for the tag in JEI.
destroy.tooltip.mixture_ingredient.refri: For best results, use _high concentration_ refrigerants. Remember you can _search_ for 'Refrigerant' in JEI.
destroy.tooltip.molecule.r_group: 'R' can be hydrogen or any carbon group
destroy.tooltip.reaction.item_reactant: Allows _%1$s moles_ of reaction to occur
destroy.tooltip.reaction.order: The order of reaction with respect to this species is _%1$s_
destroy.tooltip.reaction.product_ratio.s: _1 mole_ of this species is produced for every _mole_ of reaction
destroy.tooltip.reaction.product_ratio.p: _%1$s moles_ of this species are produced for every _mole_ of reaction
_1 mole_ of this species is consumed for every _mole_ of reaction
_%1$s moles_ of this species are consumed for every _mole_ of reaction
destroy.tooltip.redstone_programmer.beat: Show a line every nth beat. Set to 0 to disable.
destroy.tooltip.redstone_programmer.line: Make every nth line thicker. Set to 0 to disable.
destroy.tooltip.redstone_programmer.mode: When powered, pause or play. If the end is reached, restart.
When powered, begin from the start, even if already playing. Don't restart from the end.
Only play if powered, and pause otherwise. If the end is reached, restart.
Only play if powered. Pause and restart if not powered. Don't restart from the end.
Only play if powered. Pause and restart if not powered. If the end is reached, restart.
destroy.tooltip.seismometer.crude_oil: There are about %1$s bucket(s) of Crude Oil in this chunk
destroy.tooltip.vat.menu.controls: Scroll to see more information. Hold shift to scroll horizontally.
destroy.tooltip.vat.menu.search_filter: Only show molecules with matching common or IUPAC names, or formulae
destroy.tooltip.vat.menu.view.both: Show molecules in solution and gaseous form
destroy.tooltip.vat.menu.title: Vat
destroy.tooltip.vat.not_initialized: A valid Vat could _not_ be formed. _Click_ to try again, or _Ponder_ the _Vat Controller_ to learn more.
destroy.tooltip.vat.not_submerged: This pipe is _above_ the level of Mixture in this Vat. It can _still insert_ Mixtures, but can _only extract gases_.
destroy.tooltip.vat.reacting: The Mixture in this Vat is constantly changing. It will be difficult to extract it.
destroy.tooltip.vat_material.conductivit: The lower the _conductivity_ of _all_ side blocks, the slower the Vat loses and gains _heat_.
destroy.tooltip.vat_material.pressure.de: The lower the _maximum pressure_ of _any_ side block, the less _gas_ can fit inside the Vat before it _explodes_.
destroy.tooltip.vat_material.transparent: Transparent blocks can transmit _ultraviolet light_, which is needed for some reactions.
destroy.tooltip.vat_material.vat_control: A _single_ Vat Controller is needed to make a Vat. They can withstand _any pressure_ difference, do _not conduct_ heat, an are _opaque_.
effect.destroy.cancer.description: _Has no effect in-game_. Many things in Destroy are jokes, but _cancer is not one of them_. This is here to _raise awareness_ of the increase in cancer risk associated with occupational exposure, and with _harm to the ozone layer_. Please see a professional source like '_cancerresearchuk.org_'. This pop-up can be removed with _Cisplatin_.
effect.destroy.chemical_poison.descripti: Damages you, but _doesn't stop_ at half a heart.
effect.destroy.fragrance.description: Negates the effect of _smelly chemicals_ on the user.
effect.destroy.hangover.description: Deals damage every time a _loud noise_ is heard; curable with _Aspirin_.
effect.destroy.inebriation.description: Causes _drunken slipping_; higher levels also cause nausea, blindess and eventually _alcohol poisoning_. While inebriated, you can _relieve yourself_ into a _cauldron_.
effect.destroy.baby_blue_high.descriptio: Boosts speed, strength and haste, and _removes cooldown between breeding_, but is _addictive_ to players; after the high wears off, the user will experience a _withdrawal_ for a length of time dependent on how addicted they are. At high addiction levels, the user may _overdose_.
effect.destroy.baby_blue_withdrawal.desc: Causes slowness, weakness and fatigue, and _prevents eating_; only curable by taking _more Baby Blue_.
effect.destroy.sun_protection.descriptio: _Protects_ the user from harmful _UV radiation_ if the world's ozone level is too low.
item.destroy.anfo.tooltip.summary: Read that again slowly. That's right, _an foe_. ANFO is _not your friend_.
item.destroy.aspirin_syringe.tooltip.sum: The perfect remedy for those _awful migraines_.
item.destroy.aspirin_syringe.tooltip.con: Hold Syringe in Offhand, hold R-click with empty Mainhand
item.destroy.baby_blue_powder.tooltip.be: Gives a strong, short-lasting _Baby Blue High_, followed by a _Baby Blue Withdrawal_.
item.destroy.baby_blue_syringe.tooltip.s: 99.1% Pure. Gives a weak, long-lasting _Baby Blue High_, followed by a _Baby Blue Withdrawal_.
item.destroy.baby_blue_syringe.tooltip.c: Hold Syringe in Offhand, hold R-click with empty Mainhand
item.destroy.bomb_bon.tooltip.summary: This delicious _Blaze Burner_ treat has a sensation ever-so-slightly more severe than that of _popping candy_.
item.destroy.bomb_bon.tooltip.condition1: When used as Potato Cannon Ammunition
item.destroy.bucket_and_spade.tooltip.su: A timeless British toy, which is fun for literally _minutes_ on end.
item.destroy.bucket_and_spade.tooltip.co: When given to a Baby Villager
item.destroy.bucket_and_spade.tooltip.be: The _Villager_ will try and construct a _sand castle_, which they would be _very sad_ to see destroyed.
item.destroy.chorus_wine_bottle.dynamic_: A delectable beverage made of _Chorus Fruit_. The fermentation process has _honed the ability_ of the Fruit.
Increases _Inebration_ and _teleports_ you to your position roughly _%1$s seconds ago_, if it is _safe_ to do so.
item.destroy.cisplatin_syringe.tooltip.s: A real-life chemotherapeutic agent. Find out more and support developments of treatments at _cancerresearch.uk_.
item.destroy.cisplatin_syringe.tooltip.c: Hold Syringe in Offhand, hold R-click with empty Mainhand
item.destroy.coal_infused_beetroot.toolt: When used as Potato Cannon Ammunition
item.destroy.copper_infused_beetroot.too: The _Copper infusion_ means this _Beetroot_ is _buzzing with electricity_.
When used as Potato Cannon Ammunition
item.destroy.diamond_infused_beetroot.to: Infused with _thousands of rock-hard splinters_ that excel in _tearing apart_ stomach lining.
When used as Potato Cannon Ammunition
item.destroy.emerald_infused_beetroot.to: Infused with _Beryl_, which is berry good for one's jumping muscles. (Disclaimer: not really. Beryl is chronically toxic.)
When used as Potato Cannon Ammunition
item.destroy.fluorite_infused_beetroot.t: A _glimmering_ specimen that leaves one _weak_ in the knees. And the arms. And _everywhere_, actually.
When used as Potato Cannon Ammunition
Particularly effective in persuading _psychotic Mexican drug dealers_.
item.destroy.gas_mask.tooltip.summary: Safely _filters_ the air breathed by the wearer.
item.destroy.gas_mask.tooltip.behaviour1: Negates the effect of _toxic_ and _smelly_ chemicals, but _wears down_ over time.
item.destroy.gold_infused_beetroot.toolt: Gold doesn't _tarnish_, and nor does this _Beetroot_.
When used as Potato Cannon Ammunition
item.destroy.hazmat_leggings.tooltip.sum: Together with the _Gas Mask_, _Hazmat Suit_ and _Wellington Boots_, protects the wearer from nasty substances.
item.destroy.hazmat_leggings.tooltip.beh: Negates the effects of _corrosive_ and _caustic_ chemicals.
item.destroy.hazmat_suit.tooltip.summary: Together with the _Gas Mask_, _Hazmat Leggings_ and _Wellington Boots_, protects the wearer from nasty substances.
item.destroy.hazmat_suit.tooltip.behavio: Negates the effect of _corrosive_ and _caustic_ chemicals.
item.destroy.hefty_beetroot.tooltip.summ: This _vast vegetable_ is a _veritable vestige_ of _vitamins_.
item.destroy.iodine.tooltip.summary: A dull grey solid which nevertheless produces _annoying_ yellow stains anywhere you leave it.
item.destroy.iodine.tooltip.behaviour1: Releases purple fumes which can be collected as if it were _Dragon Breath_.
item.destroy.iron_infused_beetroot.toolt: The scientific name for _Beetroot_ is _Beta Vulgaris_. But not this. This is _Alpha Bulgaris_.
When used as Potato Cannon Ammunition
item.destroy.lapis_infused_beetroot.tool: Brimming with whatever _magic_ it is that makes _Enchantments_ work.
When used as Potato Cannon Ammunition
item.destroy.napalm_sundae.tooltip.summa: The only flavour of ice-cream that also sets you on fire. Your _Blaze Burners_ love it so much they even eat the bowl.
item.destroy.nickel_infused_beetroot.too: A _succulent_ vegetable that leaves one _craving for more_.
When used as Potato Cannon Ammunition
item.destroy.perfume_bottle.tooltip.summ: This _scrumptious aroma_ can mask even the _foulest_ of pongs.
REMOVEDitem.destroy.playwell.tooltip.sum: Any resemblance to other brick-based building toys is _entirely coincidental_.
REMOVEDitem.destroy.playwell.tooltip.con: When given to a Baby Villager (aged 3-99)
REMOVEDitem.destroy.playwell.tooltip.beh: The _Villager_ will build a _LEG-_ I mean, _Playwell_ house they would be _very sad_ to see destroyed.
item.destroy.potato_o.tooltip.summary: Why do Potate-Os make such _terrible liars_? You can _see right through them_!
item.destroy.redstone_infused_beetroot.t: Infused with dust that tastes so bad it actually _hurts_.
When used as Potato Cannon Ammunition
item.destroy.seismometer.tooltip.summary: A handy tool for determining how much _Crude Void Oil_ is near.
item.destroy.seismometer.tooltip.conditi: When There is a Nearby Explosion
item.destroy.seismometer.tooltip.behavio: Indicates the volume of _Crude Void Oil_ in the chunk.
item.destroy.sunscreen_bottle.tooltip.su: Shields you from the _big ball of fire in the sky_.
item.destroy.sunscreen_bottle.tooltip.be: Grants _Sun Protection_ for a while, which protects the user from _harmful UV radiation_ if the world's _ozone level_ is too low.
item.destroy.swiss_army_knife.tooltip.su: A _multitool_ which can act as a _pickaxe_, _axe_, _shovel_, _hoe_ or _shears_ at _Diamond_ mining level.
item.destroy.swiss_army_knife.tooltip.be: Can switch to a _secondary tool_ for the targeted block (e.g. hoe instead of shovel for grass).
item.destroy.tear_bottle.summary: Tears collected from a _crying_ mob or player.
item.destroy.test_tube.tooltip.summary: A vessel that can contain a _small_ amount of _liquid_ Mixture.
item.destroy.thermite_brownie.tooltip.su: This brownie is even spicier than normal. Your _Blaze Burners_ love them.
item.destroy.touch_powder.tooltip.summar: An _extremely sensitive_ explosive which can detonate if so much as _touched_. Useful with a _Seismometer_.
item.destroy.touch_powder.tooltip.behavi: What do you think it does?!
item.destroy.urine_bottle.tooltip.summar: _Ew!_ A good source of _Ammonia_ though. To obtain, _squat_ over a _water cauldron_ while inebriated...
item.destroy.wellington_boots.tooltip.su: These stylish shoes were hand-crafted by the _Duke of Wellington_ himself. Together with the _Gas Mask_, _Hazmat Suit_ and _Hazmat Leggings_, they protect the wearer from nasty substances.
item.destroy.wellington_boots.tooltip.be: Negates the effect of _corrosive_ and _caustic_ chemicals.
item.destroy.white_wheat.tooltip.summary: The type of wheat they used to eat in _the olden days_, back when everything was in _black and white_.
item.destroy.yeast.tooltip.summary: This fun fungus is a _fermentation_ fundemental.
item.destroy.zinc_infused_beetroot.toolt: When used as Potato Cannon Ammunition
